resource_explorer.title: Resource Explorer
resource_explorer.explorer.apply_warn: Applying a new filter will close the explorer and reload resources
resource_explorer.settings.title: Resource Explorer Settings
resource_explorer.settings.options_butto: Enable / Disable the button in the vanilla options screen
resource_explorer.settings.log_files.too: Enable / Disable printing out the full resource file tree to the log after every search
resource_explorer.open_tooltip: click to open the Resource Explorer
resource_explorer.filter.tooltip: Sets the filter determining what types of files show up in the Resource Explorer
resource_explorer.export_warn.vanilla: Do not re-distribute un-altered vanilla game assets!
resource_explorer.export_warn.pack: Do not re-distribute other pack maker's assets without getting permission!
resource_explorer.export_warn.mod: Do not re-distribute un-altered mod assets without the mod maker's permission!
resource_explorer.export_warn.all: Do not re-distribute un-altered assets without permission!
resource_explorer.export_start.2: This may take a while for large folders...
resource_explorer.export.tooltip.file: Export this resource to the [resource_explorer] output resource-pack
resource_explorer.export.tooltip.folder: Export these resources to the [resource_explorer] output resource-pack
resource_explorer.stats.title: Resource Explorer Statistics
resource_explorer.settings.fail_toast.to: When enabled this will add the Exception message to the Toast pop-up on the top right of the screen after a resource reload failure
resource_explorer.png_editor.title: Texture Editor
resource_explorer.png_editor.reset.toolt: Reset the image to its original state
resource_explorer.png_editor.clear.toolt: Clear the image of all pixels
resource_explorer.png_editor.undo.toolti: Undo each recent change individually, can also press Ctrl + z
resource_explorer.png_editor.export_butt: Saves this resource to the Resource Explorer export resource pack

You will need to enable the
Resource Explorer Output pack
in your resource-pack list to
see ths changes.

Upon exporting, the explorer
will exit and
resources will reload.
resource_explorer.png_editor.eraser_butt:
Changes the cursor to an eraser
Also appears whenever the color alpha is 0
resource_explorer.png_editor.pick_button:
Changes the cursor to copy the color of the next image pixel clicked on
You can also just hold down Ctrl
resource_explorer.txt_editor.title: Text editor
resource_explorer.txt_editor.reset.toolt: Undo all changes made to the text
resource_explorer.txt_editor.clear.toolt: Clear all text from the text editor
resource_explorer.txt_editor.format.tool:
Format the text for json readability.
Also minimizes white space characters.
 Does nothing if it cant parse as valid json
resource_explorer.txt_editor.validator.t: Checks if the text will parse as valid json
resource_explorer.explorer.feedback.info:
No resources were found.
Please see below exceptions
for possible causes.

As some exceptions occurred while
reading resources some resources
might be incorrect in the explorer.

Such as resources from lower
packs appearing to be on top.

Resource explorer experienced the
following failures while reading
resources:
